title: Time of the Dapper Men
description: It’s winter in Anorev, and for Ayden it is time to move on in search of new adventures. Leaving Zoe and his friends behind, Ayden journeys to far-off lands with breathtaking new vistas and curious new companions. As Ayden searches for his old mentor 41, he discovers more about growing up and taking responsibility than he ever imagined. The exciting and fantastical sequel to 2010’s Eisner Award-nominated Return of the Dapper Men , Time brings readers back to Janet Lee’s beautiful decoupage art and Jim McCann’s wonderful world of robots and magic!
author: Jim McCann
